metadata.title: Lo, Thou Art Assailed on All Sides

tracks.text: Muscular legs walk forward. Twin green blades dangle to side. The thighs bear large, dark scars.
Muscular arms and abs also bear scars.
Sunraku wears only blue shorts and a blue bird mask.
Red text appears, Shangri-La Frontier. Beyond the text is an expanse of mountains, forests, plains, and cities. We zoom out and the expanse is reflected in VR goggles worn by Rakuro
At night, Sunraku stands in a misty field
Moon light shines over Sunraku as he stands near large rocks.
Rakuro smiles. His image glitches into Sunraku, whose brow furrows
Pencilgon, a woman with long purple hair, twirls a spear in a forest.
A girl with blond pig tails walks forward. Looking away from us, she puts her hands on her hips.
A large knight wears a helmet. Emul wears a suit and top hat. She leaps and is replaced by a girl in a suit and top hat.
Vysache wears an eye patch. He holds a carrot shaped smoking pipe and sits cross legged in a low lit, traditional Japanese room
A man wearing armor and a purple cape sits on a box in a storage room.
Lycagon bears fangs over a forest, backdropped by a red moon. Yellow lines shine around her red, glowing eyes.
Sunraku runs through the woods. He leaps, and crosses in front of a full moon.
Flying through the air, he kicks and punches goblins. Holding red twin knives, he cuts at more goblins.
With red glowing fists, the blond girl fires energy blasts at goblins. Pencilgon strikes human sized wasps. They fight back to back.
Vysache, with a scar over his right eye, slowly opens his eyes.
Pencilgon strikes with a sword. The blond girl punches with a fire ball.
The knight strikes the ground, and the ground explodes with brilliant light that fades to lightning.
A town of small red houses and rabbit shaped motifs. A large temple rests at the top of a giant tree.
The town fades into the bird man's red eye
Emul leaps up, smiling.
In a forest glowing with a red mist, the blond girl, Sunraku, and Pencilgon walk side by side.
A blob emerges from the mud.
He takes a step back in the ankle deep mud.
Text, 5, Lo, Thou Art Assailed on All Sides
The green mud shark stares at Sunraku. It has 4 legs and a pair of long, catfish whiskers.
Mud Shark leaps high in the air, then dives back into the mud.
The green fin approaches fast
He equips Vorpal Choppers
Text, Repel Counter, Parries one incoming attack and unleashes a counterattack.
7 seconds cooldown
Fin approaches
Shark arcs out of the mud, on track to land ontop of Sunraku, jaws wide.
Emul puts on a monocle and opens a book
A streak of yellow light flies off the edge of the book and strikes Mud Shark in the face.
It sways unsteadily, red misting from its face, then falls backwards.
Text, Accel, Grants a temporary bonus to attack power and agility.
As Sunraku struggles, Mud Shark opens his eyes and rolls on to its stomach.
He holds 2 vorpal choppers under the shark's chin. They glow blue and a twister forms around them.
The shark's head flies back
He stabs.
Edge Climb, Stick a bladed weapon into a vertical surface to climb
He flies in the air
He balances on the shark's nose. It moves around, trying to bite.
A giant, golden arc flies down, slamming into the mud shark.
Shark lands on its back. Sunraku lands on his back. Fall Damange - 8. HP 22.
The mud lies still, gathered in the wide chasm.
He grabs Emul's hand, and pitches her high into the air.
Mud explodes around him.
He goes flying
HP 17
Emul runs
Emul pulls out a scroll
She jumps at him, 2 feet from the ground. Text, Magic Scroll Teleport.
They appear above the shark.
Sunraku shakes. Dialog, Luck.
Red mists from the mud shark. It shimmers, then distorts, then explodes.
Sunraku lands in mud. HP 1.
Level up, 28 arrow 29
high 5
Text, Area Boss, Mud Digger, Dispatch Complete
Smaller outcroppings give way to grass and hills
Sunraku and Emul walk down a dirt path
He shoves a handful of grass into his bird mask.
Herbs used. HP rises from 1 to 17
Emul pulls back a sleeve, revealing an ornate bracelet. Text, Mysterious Vorpal Bracelet.

Sparkly smoke consumes Emul. Sunraku's eyes widen. A human form wears pink shoes, white thigh high stockings with fluff, a red dress, blue coat, red kerchief, and black top hat. Human Emul has short pink hair, and a bunny mouth.
Smoke forms around Human Emul. Bunny Emul stands, eyes closed, her pink ears drooping.
He gives a thumbs up. Emul gapes.

An elaborate, white, Western-style castle sits between 2 steep cliffs. The surrounding city drapes down the hills, dotting the nearby cliffs. A tall stone wall lines the western edge down to the south, where a tall gate opens to a main street of the narrow city.
Emul and Sunraku look from a nearby cliff. Text, Thirdrema
The elaborate city gate contains tiers of ionic columns, weathered with age. Soldiers stand guard.
Sunraku eyes Human Emul.
Sunraku eyes a pair of eavesdroppers.
A woman grabs his arm. She wears a cloak with horns.
Player name, Animalia.
Text, Several Hours Earlier - Secondale
A forum scrolls by, including Alinoiyu (Beginner)'s post and picture of Sunraku running.
Curry Jones, Advanced, Is this a 'shop or something? I mean I've never seen a talking Vorpal Bunny before
Basashi Musashi (Advanced), Our clan's leader ran into Siegwurm. That one talks, apparently.
Add (Advanced) Yep, here come the furries. ... FYI this game's admin cracks down hard on cheating so it's unlikely to be that.
Thundernut (Advanced) The zookeeper moves fast!

Add (Advanced) I was trying to think of where I've seen this and I just remembered. It's a curse. ... It's proof that you're "acknowledged by the Night Emperor". Basashi Musashi (Advanced) The Night Emperor, Colossus, Lycagon the Nightslayer
Thundernut (Advanced) The pupper's been sighted near Secondale, right?
Orcelott (Advanced) I could spawn kill him until he tells us

Add (Advanced) If you PK too much and you get killed by a player or an NPC all your items are lost, including stored ones. Plus the bounty gets paid from the PK's own cash. It's a pretty brutal system. The Ashura Kai guys PK so much they can't go back.
Psyger-100
Basashi Musashi (Advanced) Looks like this Sunraku guy's in a pretty unique situtation. And he might not even realize it himself...
Human Emul hides behind Sunraku
They leap out of the way.
Pencilgon swipes with a sword where their torsos were.
Sunraku lands at the base of the gateway steps.
He equips Vorpal Choppers.
He looks at her player name. Arthur Pencilgon, Skull icon, Level 99
Rakuro floats, as if in water. Debris floats around him.
He reaches out a hand. The debris glitters.
He opens his blue eyes. He has short, spiky blue hair.
Pixels float in cyberspace. We follow a tunnel of light
Grass blows before an orange sunset.
Sunraku, bearing Lycagon's Mark, stands.
Rei opens her brown eyes. She has short brown hair that wraps around her face.
Sunraku walks on a path with Emul, a white bunny wearing a blue coat, red vest, and top hat. Emul twirls and back flips.
Surrounded by stone columns, the knight appears. Her armor is white and lined in gold. Her helmet bears a long, red plume.
Arthur Pencilgon, a woman wearing red leather and a figure hugging breast plate, looks determined. Her hair moves gently in the wind.
A blond woman looks up. She has shoulder length hair tied up in pig tails.
Sunraku stares up as clouds roll over a blue sky. It glows yellow with a sunset, then darkens to a dark purple moon.
His bird mask feathers blows in the wind.
Pencilgon stands on a cliff in front of the moon, her hands on her hips.
The blond woman crouches on an outcropping, in front of the moon
Sunraku and the knight stand, facing opposite directions, surrounded by floating debris, backdropped by a nebula that glows prismatically from red to green to blue.
Blue pixels float in cyberspace as we fly through a tunnel of light
Elementary students sit in front of a stage. Sunraku pushes the word SLF Mini
Text, #7, Fifteenth Night in SLF
A yellow moon.
In Vash's audience room, Emul bows before him. The 8 bunny attendants kneel nearby, wearing pastel yukata robes. Sunraku kneels next to an attendant.
Vash considers Emul. Emul smiles widely up at Vash.
She stands, fists in the air, eyes literally on fire.
She hits a mallet in a wooden bowl.
A pyramid of round, white mochi balls.
Text, #8, Emul's Talks with Frogs
A giant heap of mud frogs.
Emul sits on top. Lower down frogs croak between bodies.
Sunraku watches from nearby
